data.author: dintadelin

changelog.release_notes:
Minum Obat is made for accomplishing my final project to get my diploma. This project allows you to remember what medicine you should take at the right time. Minum Obat will be connected to the database which stands in one of the health center in Indonesia.
This application is inspired from a watchapp called "Pebble Diet Reminder" made by Mr. Bodnàr Istvàn. You can check his profile and his great projects at https://github.com/bodnaristvan. Thank you very much.
